title: First look at the world of electric drives

content:
这件事情如果一定要追溯，那应该来自初中对钢铁侠的热爱
The prototype of Jarvis STC8051+LD3320
Home Assistant
title: The beginning of Smart Home

content:
Me and lighting.
The duration of this project spanned my middle school and undergraduate years, and with each new location I always wanted to improve the design and implement it.
Driver Gen 1 All circuit cited from Steve UD1.3
Based 74HC74/74HC08/74HC04
The isolator is HFBT1414/HFBT2412 ST Optical Fiber
The interrupt signal transmitted through Fiber.
Gen 2 Based on CPLD Altera MAX II Integrated former door circuit into one chip. The new GDT driver used FDD8424H to instead of IRFP540/9540 totem pole MOS amplifier.
Gen 3 Based on CPLD Xilinx CoolRunner II Try to design some low power circuit and faster PWM Signal in CPLD. Add a Phase shift circuit to protect the IGBT. Add a isolated IGBT driver though Fiber to instead of Gate Driver Transformer(GDT) The MAX current of LCR Serial Resonant circuit up to 3000Amps. The input power up to 20KW
Gen 4 Based on Infineon Cypress PSoc, which integrated in FPGA, PGA and ARM Developed a GUI base on Node.js A digital operate pannel with various sensor data.
Inverter Gen 1 Based on IRFP260N Half Bridge
Gen 2 Based on IRFP460 Full Bridge
Gen 3 Based on induction cooker TO263 IGBT 40N120
Gen 4 Based on parallel TO263 IGBT full bridge
Gen 5 Based on IGBT module Mitsubishi CM300DY-12H Two sets of IGBT transistors integrated inside each module.
Gen 6 Based on IGBT module Mitsubishi CM600HA-24H Current 3000A
title: My tesla coils
Romance from the depths of the crystal

content:
I bought a 12 used car, which model is Volkswagen Golf MK4 1.8L Naturally Aspirated.
After an accident, I have to repair my car.
The car is built on the same platform as the Audi TT MK1 named PQ34.
As a result, I’ve used a variety of processes to modify my car, including but not limited to add a new turbocharger……
Teardown Engine This is the cylinder head. The hydraulic valve tappet has been damaged and the connecting surface is scratched.
Crankshaft, Camshaft, pitsons, rod, freewheel, these have been taken down.
The floating bearing has been severely damaged.
Gearbox The transmission was likewise removed and disassembled
Interiors For the interiors, the carpets, dashboard, seats, and central tunnel were all removed.
Glass Lifter Removal and Speaker Replacement
Twelve-handed objects always have some electrical problems
Rebuilding New Life……
Engine Rebuilding……
Valve grinding.
ECU Program I rebuilt the whole ECU hardware and software. The main MCU replaced by Infineon Aurix TC264 with higher frequency, which completely improves the sensor refresh rate and provides a high-speed interface for logging.
Installing A long way to go……
Engine Everything is new, new cylinder barrels, new bearings, new gaskets.
Cylinder roundness measurement in progress
Install new valve seals, valve hydraulic tappets, valve springs
Install forged crankshaft.
Oil pump, oil suction nozzle installed, oil pan installed
New gas valve base.
Forged pitsons and rods.
Intake & Turbocharger Cylinded head has been installed.
Assembling Engine wires, which include sensors, ignitations and fuel injector.
Installing engine.
Finished Channel1 is the Crankshaft Signal.
Channel2 is the Camshaft Signal.
Engine is working well.
Finally, my car had fully accomplished its rebirth way.
title: The rebirth of a gesoline car
